name: Get Squishy
description:
Welcome to Get Squishy! Squish and squash the player in any way possible to finish the level. Hope you enjoy!

This game was made in Gamemaker 2 for week 150 of the weekly game jam. The theme was "You're the enemy".

Credits:

Art from Gamedevmarket.

Flag from Kenney's Assets.

Audio from Envato Marketplace

Title by https://twitter.com/photonstorm
